channel.title: [317] Spawn NPC from an Object [Devo]
channel.description:
Base: Final Devolution 2.7 (The End)
Creator: Killamess
Search Engines Used: Yes, www.google.com, And Moparscapes Search Engine.
Edited From Original: Yes
Trying to Require: Spawn Npc From Object on a Timer
Images: No
Where Downloaded: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,391699.0.html
Hello, If someone could Help me with Making a Monster Spawn from an Object. Ex. Monkey from a statue with a timer. I saw this on another source in the Download section before. I didnt download because i didnt think it was a a good base. But Now im trying to come up with a Mini-Game witch i need that, but i dont know where to start to make Npc's Spawn from Objects.
Sorry if this is really easy, or/has been posted about. How-ever, i've tried to make a Code as like Barrows but i dont want to Press the Object Before hand they spawn. Perhaps the code can be modified on a timer?

item.title: [317] Spawn NPC from an Object [Devo]
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

well, the objects have nothing to do with it, just add a timer called like npcspawn1 and have it so when it hits 0 spawnannpc then the npc id, I could help you more with timers and stuff if you need

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Spawn NPC from an Object [Devo]
item.dc:creator: @Blood_zeus Blood zeus
item.description:
@Blood_zeus wrote:

Auto-Spawn off an object by a timer.

Edit: More than 1 spawning at a time, Like spawning off Pest control. But with Diffrent Objects and a timer for each monster. Like a spinner after 5 seconds. Then after 10 seconds a brawler. from that same Portal. But i want to do it with diffrent Monsters, and Objects. Or could i use Pest control as a base for that?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Spawn NPC from an Object [Devo]
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

do you mean like they autospawn near an object?

Read full topic
